t: Amazon didn’t choose Chicago for HQ2. Now what? – Chicago Tribune
s: December 12, 2018 - Amazon will split its second headquarters between New York’s Long Island City and Arlington in northern Virginia, the e-commerce giant said Tuesday, ending Chicago’s hopes of adding a highly coveted corporate name and thousands of high-paying jobs to the city’s burgeoning tech sector.
